Film Flam/The Secret Life of Dave Seville
Who Ghost There?/Romancing Miss Stone
description: Who Ghost There?:Alvin, Simon and Theodore find a letter explaining that their house is haunted and try to get rid of the ghost Romancing Miss Stone: Alvin has a crush on his teacher, Miss Stone, and when Dave takes an interest in her, Alvin challenges him to a duel.

title: A Chip Off the Old Tooth/Three Alarm Alvin
Good Old Simon/The Chipmunks Go to Washington
Soccer to Me/Every Chipmunk Tells a Story
A Little Worm in the Big Apple/Staying Afloat
The Chipette Story
description: After a concert, the Chippettes meet up with an old friend from the orphanage in Australia where they first grew up. The Chippettes explain how they escaped the orphanage and its evil headmistress, and came to be singing sensations.

title: The Prize Isn't Right/The Gold of My Dreams
Teevee or Not Teevee/A Rash of Babies
Whatever's Happened to Dave Seville?/Simon Seville, Superstar
Miss Miller's Big Gamble/Sweet Smell of Success
Cinderella? Cinderella?
description: When Miss Miller makes Brittany stay behind from a party to clean the kitchen, she imagines herself as Cinderella.

title: Experiment in Error/How You Gonna Keep 'Em Down on the Farm?
Back to Dave's Future/Tell It to the Judge
Simon Says/When the Chips Are Down
Old Friends/The Mystery of Seville Manor
Just One of the Girls/Goin' Down to Dixie
No Chipmunk Is an Island/Babysitter Frightnight
Food for Thought
description: Simon and Alvin walk Theodore through American History in hopes that he can pass his test and go with them to the amusement park.

title: Treasure Island
description: The power goes out, leaving Alvin without his electric toys, television, or music, so Dave introduces the boys to another form of entertainment: reading, and his book of choice is Treasure Island.

title: Alvie's Angels
description: The Chippettes run into a jewel thief and get knocked out, during which time Brittany imagines them as a group of crime fighting 'Angels', working for the unseen Alvie.

title: Theodore's Life as a Dog/Queen of the High School Ballroom
Psychic Alvin/A Special Kind of Champion
Alvin's Obsession/Alvin's Not So Super Hero
Dave's Wonderful Life
description: Swept up in a holiday mood, Alvin gives away his cherished harmonica to a sick little boy. Meanwhile, Dave has booked Alvin to perform a harmonica solo at Carnegie Hall! Alvin keeps the loss of his harmonica a secret from Dave, and with the help of Simon and Theodore scrambles to earn enough money to buy another harmonica in time for his Carnegie Hall debut! Along the way you'll hear Alvin, Simon and Theodore getting ready for the Big Night, singing their own comical versions of holiday favorites like "Jingle Bells," "Deck the Halls" and their famous "Chipmunk Song (Christmas Don't Be Late)"! This heartwarming story, brimming with joyful music, makes "A Chipmunk Christmas" a great way to celebrate the holidays... any day!

Alvin keeps the loss of his harmonica a secret from Dave, and with the help of Simon and Theodore scrambles to earn enough money to buy another harmonica in time for his Carnegie Hall debut! Along the way you'll hear Alvin, Simon and Theodore getting ready for the Big Night, singing their own comical versions of holiday favorites like "Jingle Bells," "Deck the Halls" and their famous "Chipmunk Song (Christmas Don't Be Late)"! This heartwarming story, brimming with joyful music, makes "A Chipmunk Christmas" a great way to celebrate the holidays... any day!
